title: Gifting disabled?
body: So I am trying to gift one of my friends but if I go to the shop it says it's unavailable. Will it take long for it to come available again?

replies.body: Are you using the updated client?  If so, gifting is not available yet.  You'll have to log onto the legacy client to perform gifting or account actions.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Sure seems like bad timing with the holidays around the corner...  Lots of people are lazy and won't bother with this if they have to update their clients
If i press the legacy client shortcut then it first opens the legacy but then it instant opens the alpha / beta client, how to overcome this?{{champion:32}}

Open the beta client and at the bottom of the login page there should be an option that reads "Launch legacy client". You will want to click that to use the legacy client.

For more information you can check here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-Updated-Client-Open-Beta-FAQ
